original_text: He teareth me in his wrath, who hateth me: he gnasheth upon me with his teeth; mine enemy sharpeneth his eyes upon me.
korean_text: 그는 진노하사 나를 찢고 적대시 하시며 나를 향하여 이를 갈고 원수가 되어 날카로운 눈초리로 나를 보시고

sentences.original_text: He teareth me in his wrath
he gnasheth upon me with his teeth
mine enemy sharpeneth his eyes upon me
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 원수가 나를 향해 그의 눈을 날카롭게 한다
